name: squeeze
description: Compress terminal logs and ask Copilot

chatParticipants.name: squeeze
chatParticipants.description: Compress context files before sending to LLM

squeeze.compressPrompt.description: Compress the chat prompt before sending to LLM

squeeze.compressFiles.description: Compress files from context window before sending to LLM

squeeze.compressTerminalOutput.description: Compress terminal output before sending to LLM

squeeze.compressionModel.description: Compression model to use (sent to API)

squeeze.apiEndpoint.description: API endpoint URL for compression service

squeeze.targetLLM.description: Target LLM to send compressed messages to

squeeze.customLLMEndpoint.description: Custom LLM API endpoint (if targetLLM is 'custom')

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
